inclusion.criterion: diagnosis of leukemia, lymphoma, or brain tumor
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: within 2 months to 14 months after beginning treatment for cancer
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: major physical, neurologic, or psychiatric condition
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of acne and mild hirsutism, with elevated testosterone levels. She also has some irregularity in her menstrual cycle and nipple discharge.
